attributes.action: abandon any glorification of Margaret Thatcher with a state funeral
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Magaret Hilda Thatcher deliberately set out to destroy the jobs, lives and communities of large parts of the country in order to make a small part of the south east of england richer. She was the most heartless, divisive PM this country has ever had and deserves only the celebration of her death not the glorification of her life.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
